verses.t: Let us{G5399} therefore{G3767} fear{G5399}, lest{G3379}, a promise{G1860} being left{G2641} us of entering{G1525} into{G1519} his{G846} rest{G3588}, any{G5100} of{G1537} you{G5216} should seem{G1380} to come short of it{G5302}.

For{G1063} unto{G2097} us was{G2070} the gospel preached{G2097}, as well as{G2509} unto them{G2548}: but{G235} the word{G3588} preached{G3588} did{G5623} not{G3756} profit{G5623} them{G1565}, not{G3361} being mixed with{G4786} faith{G3588} in them that heard{G191} it.

For{G1063} we{G1525} which have believed{G4100} do enter{G1525} into{G1519} rest{G3588}, as{G2531} he said{G2046}, As{G5613} I have sworn{G3660} in{G1722} my{G3450} wrath{G3588}, if{G1487} they shall enter{G1525} into{G1519} my{G3450} rest{G3588}: although{G2543} the works{G3588} were finished{G1096} from{G575} the foundation{G2602} of the world{G2889}.

For{G1063} he spake{G2046} in a certain place{G4225} of{G4012} the seventh{G1442} day on this wise{G3779}, And{G2532} God{G3588} did rest{G2664} the{G3588} seventh{G1442} day{G2250} from{G575} all{G3956} his{G846} works{G3588}.
And{G2532} in{G1722} this{G5129} place again{G3825}, If{G1487} they shall enter{G1525} into{G1519} my{G3450} rest{G3588}.

Seeing{G1893} therefore{G3767} it remaineth{G620} that some{G5100} must enter{G1525} there{G846}in{G1519}, and{G2532} they to whom it was{G2097} first{G4386} preached{G2097} entered{G1525} not{G3756} in{G1525} because of{G1223} unbelief{G543}:

Again{G3825}, he limiteth{G3724} a certain{G5100}day{G2250}, saying{G3004} in{G1722} David{G1138}, To day{G4594}, after{G3326} so long{G5118} a time{G5550}; as{G2531} it is said{G2046}, To day{G4594} if{G1437} ye will hear{G191} his{G846} voice{G3588}, harden{G4645} not{G3361} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}.
For{G1063} if{G1487} Jesus{G2424} had given{G2664} them{G846} rest{G2664}, then{G302} would he{G2980} not{G3756} afterward{G3326} have spoken{G2980} of{G4012} another{G243} day{G2250}.
There remaineth{G620} therefore{G686} a rest{G4520} to the people{G3588} of God{G3588}.
For{G1063} he that is entered{G1525} into{G1519} his{G846} rest{G3588}, he{G846} also{G2532} hath ceased{G2664} from{G575} his own{G2398} works{G3588}, as{G5618} God{G3588} did from{G575} his{G846}.
Let us labour{G4704} therefore{G3767} to enter{G1525} into{G1519} that{G1565} rest{G3588}, lest{G3361} any man{G5100} fall{G4098} after{G1722} the same{G846} example{G5262} of unbelief{G3588}.

For{G1063} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} is quick{G2198}, and{G2532} powerful{G1756}, and{G2532} sharper{G5114} than{G5228} any{G3956} twoedged{G1366} sword{G3162}, piercing{G1338} even{G2532} to{G891} the dividing asunder{G3311} of soul{G5590} and{G2532} spirit{G4151}, and{G5037} of the joints{G719} and{G2532} marrow{G3452}, and{G2532} is a discerner{G2924} of the thoughts{G1761} and{G2532} intents{G1771} of the heart{G2588}.

Neither{G3756} is there{G2076} any creature{G2937} that is not manifest{G852} in{G1799} his{G846} sight{G1799}: but{G1161} all things{G3956} are naked{G1131} and{G2532} opened{G5136} unto the eyes{G3588} of him{G846} with{G4314} whom{G3739} we have{G2254} to do{G3588}.

Seeing then{G3767} that we have{G2192} a{G749} great{G3173} high priest{G749}, that is passed into{G1330} the heavens{G3588}, Jesus{G2424} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}, let us hold fast{G2902} our profession{G3588}.

For{G1063} we have{G2192} not{G3756} an high priest which{G749} can{G1410}not{G3361} be touched with the feeling of{G4834} our{G2257} infirmities{G3588}; but{G1161} was{G3985} in{G2596} all points{G3956} tempted{G3985} like as{G3665} we are, yet without{G5565} sin{G266}.

Let us{G4334} therefore{G3767} come{G4334} bold{G3954}ly{G3326} unto the throne{G3588} of grace{G3588}, that{G2443} we may obtain{G2983} mercy{G1656}, and{G2532} find{G2147} grace{G5485} to{G1519} help{G996} in time of need{G2121}.
